dialogues.text: A transfer student came to our class. Can you introduce yourself to the class?
options: Hi, I'm Jiung. Nice to meet you.

dialogues.text: Jiung, your seat is next to Wansu over there. Can you raise your hand, Wansu?
options: Go sit somewhere else I like.

dialogues.text: Wansu: Hi Jiung, I'm Wansu! Let's get along well!
options: Sure, Wansu! Let's be good friends!
What do you mean by 'let's get along'?

dialogues.text: Break Time. Wansu: Yay, it's break time! I'm already hungry. Did you have breakfast?
